```diff
+             // ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³

+         private void DrawSceneLights()

+                 }
+                 else
+                 {
+                     foreach (var light in sceneLights)
+                     {
+                         if (light != null)
+                         {
+                             EditorGUILayout.BeginHorizontal();
+                             
+                             EditorGUILayout.LabelField(light.name);
+                             EditorGUILayout.LabelField($"å¼·åº¦: {light.intensity:F2}");
+                             
+                             if (GUILayout.Button("é¸æŠ", GUILayout.Width(50)))
+                             {
+                                 Selection.activeGameObject = light.gameObject;
+                             }
+                             
+                             if (GUILayout.Button("å‰Šé™¤", GUILayout.Width(50)))
+                             {
+                                 if (EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("ç¢ºèª", $"ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã€Œ{light.name}ã€ã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ", "å‰Šé™¤", "ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«"))
+                                 {
+                                     DestroyImmediate(light.gameObject);
+                                     RefreshSceneLights();
+                                 }
+                             }
+                             
+                             EditorGUILayout.EndHorizontal();
+                         }
+                     }
+                 }
+             }
+         }

+         private static void CreateLightFromPreset(ExternalLightSettings preset)
+         {
+             var lightObj = CreateLightFromSettings(preset);
+             
+             if (lightObj != null)
+             {
+                 Selection.activeGameObject = lightObj;
+                 EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("æˆåŠŸ", $"ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã€Œ{preset.lightName}ã€ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚", "OK");
+             }
+         }
+         
+         private static GameObject CreateLightFromSettings(ExternalLightSettings settings)
+         {
+             try
+             {
+                 // ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã®GameObjectã‚’ä½œæˆ
+                 var lightObj = new GameObject(settings.lightName);
+                 
+                 // Lightã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’è¿½åŠ 
+                 var light = lightObj.AddComponent<Light>();
+                 
+                 // åŸºæœ¬è¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 light.type = settings.lightType;
+                 light.intensity = settings.intensity;
+                 light.color = settings.color;
+                 light.shadows = settings.shadows;
+                 light.shadowStrength = settings.shadowStrength;
+                 
+                 // ä½ç½®ã¨è§’åº¦ã‚’è¨­å®š
+                 lightObj.transform.position = settings.position;
+                 lightObj.transform.rotation = Quaternion.Euler(settings.rotation);
+                 
+                 // ç‰¹æ®ŠåŠ¹æœã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 if (settings.enableCookie && settings.cookie != null)
+                 {
+                     light.cookie = settings.cookie;
+                     light.cookieSize = settings.cookieSize;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡é¢¨è¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 if (settings.enableAnimeStyle)
+                 {
+                     light.color = settings.animeLightColor;
+                     light.intensity = settings.animeIntensity;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // æ˜ ç”»é¢¨è¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 if (settings.enableCinematicStyle)
+                 {
+                     light.color = settings.cinematicLightColor;
+                     light.intensity = settings.cinematicIntensity;
+                     
+                     // æ˜ ç”»é¢¨ã®è§’åº¦ã‚’é©ç”¨
+                     var cinematicRotation = settings.rotation;
+                     cinematicRotation.x = settings.cinematicAngle;
+                     lightObj.transform.rotation = Quaternion.Euler(cinematicRotation);
+                 }
+                 
+                 // é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚²ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã™ã‚‹
+                 var selectedObjects = Selection.gameObjects;
+                 if (selectedObjects.Length > 0)
+                 {
+                     var target = selectedObjects[0];
+                     lightObj.transform.LookAt(target.transform);
+                 }
+                 
+                 // Undoã«ç™»éŒ²
+                 Undo.RegisterCreatedObjectUndo(lightObj, "Create External Light");
+                 
+                 return lightObj;
+             }
+             catch (System.Exception e)
+             {
+                 Debug.LogError($"ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆä½œæˆã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e.Message}");
+                 EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼", $"ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆä½œæˆä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ: {e.Message}", "OK");
+                 return null;
+             }
+         }
+         
+         private void UpdateSelectedLight(ExternalLightSettings settings)
+         {
+             var selectedObjects = Selection.gameObjects;
+             
+             if (selectedObjects.Length == 0)
+             {
+                 EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("æƒ…å ±", "æ›´æ–°ã™ã‚‹ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚", "OK");
+                 return;
+             }
+             
+             foreach (var obj in selectedObjects)
+             {
+                 var light = obj.GetComponent<Light>();
+                 if (light != null)
+                 {
+                     // åŸºæœ¬è¨­å®šã‚’æ›´æ–°
+                     light.type = settings.lightType;
+                     light.intensity = settings.intensity;
+                     light.color = settings.color;
+                     light.shadows = settings.shadows;
+                     light.shadowStrength = settings.shadowStrength;
+                     
+                     // ä½ç½®ã¨è§’åº¦ã‚’æ›´æ–°
+                     obj.transform.position = settings.position;
+                     obj.transform.rotation = Quaternion.Euler(settings.rotation);
+                     
+                     // ç‰¹æ®ŠåŠ¹æœã‚’æ›´æ–°
+                     if (settings.enableCookie && settings.cookie != null)
+                     {
+                         light.cookie = settings.cookie;
+                         light.cookieSize = settings.cookieSize;
+                     }
+                     
+                     // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡é¢¨è¨­å®šã‚’æ›´æ–°
+                     if (settings.enableAnimeStyle)
+                     {
+                         light.color = settings.animeLightColor;
+                         light.intensity = settings.animeIntensity;
+                     }
+                     
+                     // æ˜ ç”»é¢¨è¨­å®šã‚’æ›´æ–°
+                     if (settings.enableCinematicStyle)
+                     {
+                         light.color = settings.cinematicLightColor;
+                         light.intensity = settings.cinematicIntensity;
+                         
+                         var cinematicRotation = settings.rotation;
+                         cinematicRotation.x = settings.cinematicAngle;
+                         obj.transform.rotation = Quaternion.Euler(cinematicRotation);
+                     }
+                     
+                     EditorUtility.SetDirty(obj);
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("æˆåŠŸ", "é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’æ›´æ–°ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚", "OK");
+         }
+         
+         #endregion
+         
+         #region ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ãƒ†ã‚£ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£
+         
+         private void RefreshSceneLights()
+         {
+             sceneLights.Clear();
+             var lights = FindObjectsOfType<Light>();
+             sceneLights.AddRange(lights);
+         }
+         
+         private ExternalLightSettings CloneSettings(ExternalLightSettings original)
+         {
+             return new ExternalLightSettings
+             {
+                 lightName = original.lightName,
+                 lightType = original.lightType,
+                 intensity = original.intensity,
+                 color = original.color,
+                 position = original.position,
+                 rotation = original.rotation,
+                 distance = original.distance,
+                 shadows = original.shadows,
+                 shadowStrength = original.shadowStrength,
+                 shadowResolution = original.shadowResolution,
+                 enableCookie = original.enableCookie,
+                 cookie = original.cookie,
+                 cookieSize = original.cookieSize,
+                 enableAnimeStyle = original.enableAnimeStyle,
+                 animeLightColor = original.animeLightColor,
+                 animeIntensity = original.animeIntensity,
+                 enableCinematicStyle = original.enableCinematicStyle,
+                 cinematicLightColor = original.cinematicLightColor,
+                 cinematicIntensity = original.cinematicIntensity,
+                 cinematicAngle = original.cinematicAngle
+             };
+         }
+         
+         #endregion
+     }
+ } 
```

ç´ æ™´ã‚‰ã—ã„ï¼å¤–éƒ¨ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆç®¡ç†ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚‚ä½œæˆã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚ˆï¼æ¬¡ã«ã€çµ±åˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚’ä½œæˆã—ã‚ˆã†ï¼

```diff
+                 }
+                 
+                 EditorGUILayout.Space(5);
+                 
+                 if (GUILayout.Button("é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ—ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚’é©ç”¨"))
+                 {
+                     if (selectedPreset != null)
+                     {
+                         ApplyIntegratedPreset(selectedPreset);
+                     }
+                     else
+                     {
+                         EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("æƒ…å ±", "é©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ãƒ—ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚", "OK");
+                     }
+                 }
+                 
+                 EditorGUILayout.EndVertical();
+             }
+         }
+         
+         #endregion
+         
+         #region ãƒ—ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆé©ç”¨
+         
+         private static void ApplyIntegratedPreset(IntegratedPreset preset)
+         {
+             if (preset == null) return;
+             
+             try
+             {
+                 var selectedObjects = Selection.gameObjects;
+                 
+                 if (selectedObjects.Length == 0)
+                 {
+                     EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("æƒ…å ±", "é©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’é¸æŠã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚", "OK");
+                     return;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // PCSSè¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 if (!applyLightOnly)
+                 {
+                     ApplyPCSSSettings(preset.pcssSettings, selectedObjects);
+                 }
+                 
+                 // ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆè¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 if (!applyPCSSOnly)
+                 {
+                     ApplyLightSettings(preset.lightSettings, selectedObjects);
+                 }
+                 
+                 EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("æˆåŠŸ", $"ãƒ—ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã€Œ{preset.name}ã€ã‚’é©ç”¨ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚", "OK");
+                 
+                 // ã‚·ãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚’æ›´æ–°
+                 EditorUtility.SetDirty(selectedObjects[0]);
+                 SceneView.RepaintAll();
+             }
+             catch (System.Exception e)
+             {
+                 Debug.LogError($"ãƒ—ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆé©ç”¨ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: {e.Message}");
+                 EditorUtility.DisplayDialog("ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼", $"ãƒ—ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆé©ç”¨ä¸­ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ã¾ã—ãŸ: {e.Message}", "OK");
+             }
+         }
+         
+         private static void ApplyPCSSSettings(PCSSPresetManager.PCSSSettings settings, GameObject[] objects)
+         {
+             foreach (var obj in objects)
+             {
+                 // ãƒãƒ†ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ«ã«PCSSè¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+                 var renderers = obj.GetComponentsInChildren<Renderer>();
+                 
+                 foreach (var renderer in renderers)
+                 {
+                     var materials = renderer.sharedMaterials;
+                     
+                     foreach (var material in materials)
+                     {
+                         if (material != null && material.shader != null)
+                         {
+                             ApplyPCSSSettingsToMaterial(material, settings);
+                         }
+                     }
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+         
+         private static void ApplyPCSSSettingsToMaterial(Material material, PCSSPresetManager.PCSSSettings settings)
+         {
+             // PCSSé–¢é€£ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¨­å®š
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSShadowDistance"))
+                 material.SetFloat("_PCSSShadowDistance", settings.shadowDistance);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSShadowSoftness"))
+                 material.SetFloat("_PCSSShadowSoftness", settings.shadowSoftness);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSShadowIntensity"))
+                 material.SetFloat("_PCSSShadowIntensity", settings.shadowIntensity);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSShadowSamples"))
+                 material.SetInt("_PCSSShadowSamples", settings.shadowSamples);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSFilterRadius"))
+                 material.SetFloat("_PCSSFilterRadius", settings.filterRadius);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSShadowBias"))
+                 material.SetFloat("_PCSSShadowBias", settings.shadowBias);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSShadowColor"))
+                 material.SetColor("_PCSSShadowColor", settings.shadowColor);
+             
+             if (material.HasProperty("_PCSSAmbientOcclusion"))
+                 material.SetFloat("_PCSSAmbientOcclusion", settings.ambientOcclusion);
+             
+             // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡é¢¨è¨­å®š
+             if (settings.enableAnimeStyle)
+             {
+                 if (material.HasProperty("_CelShadingThreshold"))
+                     material.SetFloat("_CelShadingThreshold", settings.celShadingThreshold);
+                 
+                 if (material.HasProperty("_CelShadingSmoothness"))
+                     material.SetFloat("_CelShadingSmoothness", settings.celShadingSmoothness);
+             }
+             
+             // æ˜ ç”»é¢¨è¨­å®š
+             if (settings.enableCinematicStyle)
+             {
+                 if (material.HasProperty("_FilmGrain"))
+                     material.SetFloat("_FilmGrain", settings.filmGrain);
+                 
+                 if (material.HasProperty("_Vignette"))
+                     material.SetFloat("_Vignette", settings.vignette);
+                 
+                 if (material.HasProperty("_Bloom"))
+                     material.SetFloat("_Bloom", settings.bloom);
+             }
+         }
+         
+         private static void ApplyLightSettings(ExternalLightManager.ExternalLightSettings settings, GameObject[] objects)
+         {
+             // æ—¢å­˜ã®ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤
+             var existingLights = FindObjectsOfType<Light>();
+             foreach (var light in existingLights)
+             {
+                 if (light.name.Contains("ExternalLight") || light.name.Contains("PCSS"))
+                 {
+                     DestroyImmediate(light.gameObject);
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             // æ–°ã—ã„ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒˆã‚’ä½œæˆ
+             var lightObj = new GameObject(settings.lightName);
+             var light = lightObj.AddComponent<Light>();
+             
+             // åŸºæœ¬è¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+             light.type = settings.lightType;
+             light.intensity = settings.intensity;
+             light.color = settings.color;
+             light.shadows = settings.shadows;
+             light.shadowStrength = settings.shadowStrength;
+             
+             // ä½ç½®ã¨è§’åº¦ã‚’è¨­å®š
+             lightObj.transform.position = settings.position;
+             lightObj.transform.rotation = Quaternion.Euler(settings.rotation);
+             
+             // ç‰¹æ®ŠåŠ¹æœã‚’é©ç”¨
+             if (settings.enableCookie && settings.cookie != null)
+             {
+                 light.cookie = settings.cookie;
+                 light.cookieSize = settings.cookieSize;
+             }
+             
+             // ã‚¢ãƒ‹ãƒ¡é¢¨è¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+             if (settings.enableAnimeStyle)
+             {
+                 light.color = settings.animeLightColor;
+                 light.intensity = settings.animeIntensity;
+             }
+             
+             // æ˜ ç”»é¢¨è¨­å®šã‚’é©ç”¨
+             if (settings.enableCinematicStyle)
+             {
+                 light.color = settings.cinematicLightColor;
+                 light.intensity = settings.cinematicIntensity;
+                 
+                 var cinematicRotation = settings.rotation;
+                 cinematicRotation.x = settings.cinematicAngle;
+                 lightObj.transform.rotation = Quaternion.Euler(cinematicRotation);
+             }
+             
+             // é¸æŠã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã‚’ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã‚²ãƒƒãƒˆã«ã™ã‚‹
+             if (objects.Length > 0)
+             {
+                 var target = objects[0];
+                 lightObj.transform.LookAt(target.transform);
+             }
+             
+             // Undoã«ç™»éŒ²
+             Undo.RegisterCreatedObjectUndo(lightObj, "Create Integrated Light");
+         }
+         
+         #endregion
+     }
+ } 
```

```diff
+ using UnityEditor;
+ using UnityEngine;
+ using System.Linq;
+ 
+ public class ShaderAutoConverter : AssetPostprocessor
+ {
+     // ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆå¾Œã«ãƒãƒ†ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ«ã®ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’è‡ªå‹•å¤‰æ›
+     void OnPostprocessModel(GameObject root)
+     {
+         // ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ«ã‹ã‚‰ã™ã¹ã¦ã®Rendererã‚³ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å–å¾—
+         Renderer[] renderers = root.GetComponentsInChildren<Renderer>(true);
+         
+         foreach (Renderer renderer in renderers)
+         {
+             foreach (Material material in renderer.sharedMaterials)
+             {
+                 if (material == null)
+                 {
+                     Debug.LogWarning($"[ShaderAutoConverter] Material is null on renderer: {renderer.name}. Skipping shader conversion.");
+                     continue;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // ç¾åœ¨ã®ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼åã‚’å–å¾—
+                 string currentShaderName = material.shader.name;
+                 
+                 // å¤‰æ›å¯¾è±¡ã®ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆ
+                 string[] targetShaderNames = new string[]
+                 {
+                     "Standard",
+                     "Universal Render Pipeline/Lit",
+                     // ä»–ã«è‡ªå‹•å¤‰æ›ã—ãŸã„ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼åãŒã‚ã‚Œã°ã“ã“ã«è¿½åŠ 
+                 };
+                 
+                 // lilToonã¾ãŸã¯lilToon PCSS Extensionã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’æ¤œç´¢
+                 Shader lilToonShader = Shader.Find("lilToon");
+                 Shader lilToonPCSSShader = Shader.Find("lilToon/lilToon_PCSS"); // PCSS Extensionã®ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼åã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦èª¿æ•´
+                 Shader targetNewShader = null;
+                 
+                 // å„ªå…ˆé †ä½: PCSS Extension -> lilToon
+                 if (lilToonPCSSShader != null)
+                 {
+                     targetNewShader = lilToonPCSSShader;
+                 }
+                 else if (lilToonShader != null)
+                 {
+                     targetNewShader = lilToonShader;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // å¤‰æ›å¯¾è±¡ã®ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã§ã‚ã‚Šã€ã‹ã¤æ–°ã—ã„ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ãŒè¦‹ã¤ã‹ã£ãŸå ´åˆ
+                 if (targetShaderNames.Contains(currentShaderName) && targetNewShader != null)
+                 {
+                     // ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ç¢ºèªãƒ€ã‚¤ã‚¢ãƒ­ã‚°ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
+                     if (EditorUtility.DisplayDialog(
+                         "Shader Auto Converter",
+                         $"ãƒ¢ãƒ‡ãƒ« '{root.name}' ã®ãƒãƒ†ãƒªã‚¢ãƒ« '{material.name}' ãŒ '{currentShaderName}' ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚\n" +
+                         $"ã“ã‚Œã‚’ '{targetNewShader.name}' ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã«è‡ªå‹•å¤‰æ›ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿ",
+                         "ã¯ã„",
+                         "ã„ã„ãˆ"))
+                     {
+                         // ã‚·ã‚§ãƒ¼ãƒ€ãƒ¼ã‚’å¤‰æ›
+                         material.shader = targetNewShader;
+                         Debug.Log($"[ShaderAutoConverter] Converted material '{material.name}' shader from '{currentShaderName}' to '{targetNewShader.name}'.");
+                         
+                         // å¿…è¦ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ã€åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ï¼ˆMain Color, Main Textureãªã©ï¼‰
+                         // ã“ã“ã§ã¯åŸºæœ¬çš„ãªãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã®ã¿ã‚’ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¾ã™
+                         // ã‚ˆã‚Šè©³ç´°ãªãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã®ãƒãƒƒãƒ”ãƒ³ã‚°ãŒå¿…è¦ãªå ´åˆã¯ã€ã“ã“ã«è¿½åŠ ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’è¨˜è¿°ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„
+                         if (material.HasProperty("_Color") && material.HasProperty("_MainTex"))
+                         {
+                             Color color = material.color;
+                             Texture mainTex = material.mainTexture;
+                             material.SetColor("_Color", color);
+                             material.SetTexture("_MainTex", mainTex);
+                         }
+                     }
+                     else
+                     {
+                         Debug.Log($"[ShaderAutoConverter] User declined shader conversion for material '{material.name}'.");
+                     }
+                 }
+                 else if (targetShaderNames.Contains(currentShaderName) && targetNewShader == null)
+                 {
+                     Debug.LogWarning($"[ShaderAutoConverter] Could not find 'lilToon' or 'lilToon/lilToon_PCSS' shader in the project. Material '{material.name}' shader '{currentShaderName}' was not converted.");
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+     }
+ }
  
```
